thinkpol.client package¶

Submodules¶

thinkpol.client.client module¶

thinkpol.client.client.upload_sample(host, port, path)¶

Accepts a host address, a port and a file name and uploads cognition snapshots from the file to the specified address.

Parameters

  • host (str) – the host we send the data to

  • port (int) – the port we send the data to

  • path (str) – the path of the file we process

thinkpol.client.client_utils module¶

thinkpol.client.client_utils.get_user_msg(r)¶

Gets a formatted binary message containing user information from a reader object.

Parameters

r (Reader) – the reader object

Returns

the formatted binary message

Return type

bytes

thinkpol.client.client_utils.send_snapshot(user_msg, snapshot, host, port)¶

Sends a single snapshot of a user’s cognition to server in address host:port.

Parameters

  • user_msg (bytes) – the serialized binary info of the user who’s snapshot we’re to send

  • snapshot (Snapshot) – the snapshot we’re to send

  • host (str) – the host of the server

  • port (str) – the port of the server

Module contents¶

Uploads cognition snapshots from a specified formatted binary file to a server.

Thinkpol
